attributes.name: Ahzidal's Genius
attributes.description: Increases your Enchanting skill by 10 points.

attributes.name: Ancestor's Wrath
attributes.description: Opponents that get too close take 8 points per second of fire damage for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Bardic Knowledge
attributes.description: Summons a spectral drum that plays for 300 seconds, improving Stamina Regen for you and nearby allies.

attributes.name: Bats
attributes.description: Allows the Dragonborn to turn into a cloud of bats then flies forward several feet before reforming as a Vampire Lord. It can be activated twice in quick succession, but then requires a 20-second cooldown.
